long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser cleaner can be used to clear data from your browser such as: appcache, cache, cacheStorage, cookies, downloads, fileSystems, formData, history, indexedDB, localStorage, passwords, serviceWorkers, webSQL.
And not just clean, you can select additional features like:
- Time frame. Only want to delete data starting from some date or for last x hours? It is possible. 
- Origins types. The extension can delete data from ordinary sites, websites that have been installed as hosted applications, extensions or altogether
- Origins. Interested in deleting data from specific URLs or everywhere, except some? It can be done as well
